name: HTTPS to MachineAdvisor V1.2
info:
This Node send a Message by HTTPS to a url.
It's dedicated to send data to EcoStruxure Machine Advisor.

You need to provide through the input flow following values:
 - msg.CustomHeader2 (type String)
 - msg.prefix (type String)
 - msg.Server (type String)
 - msg.proxy (type String)
 - msg.payload (JSON String either Format Tango or Format Charlie)

name: curl args
Buffer
V1.1
info:
V1.0 2019.03.08
    - StoreAndForward not persistend implemented.
V1.1 2019.03.08
    - delete Buffer with msg.deleteBuffer

name: sendConnectionStatus
prepare Monitor Configuration
curl args
Buffer
V1.2
info:
V1.0 2019.03.08
    - StoreAndForward not persistend implemented.
V1.1 2019.03.08
    - delete Buffer with msg.deleteBuffer
    - take the Proxy from msg.proxy
    - adaptation for changes in NodeRed V0.20.x
V1.2 2019.03.28
    - Bugfix: When a new message arrive while another is in process.
    - Merged together in one Subflow.
    - Added status message for Buffer Size

name: 30 sec RC + 20
10 sec RC

msg2 = {payload: msg.payload};
return msg2;

format:
<script id="clockScript1" type="text/javascript">
    var clockInterval;
    $(function () {
        if (clockInterval) return;

        //add logo
        var div1 = $('<div/>');
        var logo = new Image();

        logo.src = '/images/logo.jpg'
        logo.height = 45;
        div1[0].style.margin = '10px auto';

        div1.append(logo);
		
         //add clock
        var div2 = $('<div/>');
        var p = $('<p/>');

        div2.append(p);
        div2[0].style.margin = '5px';
		
       //add logo_baldi
        var div3 = $('<div/>');
        var logo1 = new Image();

        logo1.src = '/images/logo_baldi.png'
        logo1.height = 45;
        div3[0].style.margin = '10px auto';

        div3.append(logo1);

        function displayTime() {
            p.text(new Date().toLocaleString());
        }
        
        clockInterval = setInterval(displayTime, 1000);

        //add to toolbar when it's available
        var addToToolbarTimer;
        
        function addToToolbar() {
            var toolbar = $('.md-toolbar-tools');
            
            if(!toolbar.length) return;
            
            toolbar.append(div3);
            toolbar.append(div1);
            toolbar.append(div2);
			
            clearInterval(addToToolbarTimer);
        }
        addToToolbarTimer = setInterval(addToToolbar, 100);
    });
</script>

name: index.html
info:
<!doctype html>
<!-- Note that adding an appcache really speeds things up after the first load
    You need to amend the appcache file to meet your needs.
    Don't forget to change the appcache file if you update ANY
    of the files in it otherwise the old versions will ALWAYS be used.
<html lang="en" manifest="./uibuilder.appcache">
-->
<html lang="en">
<!--
    This is the default, template html for uibuilder.
    It is meant to demonstrate the use of VueJS & bootstrap-vue to dynamically
    update the ui based on incoming/outgoing messages from/to the
    Node-RED server.

    You will want to alter this to suite your own needs. To do so,
    copy this file to <userDir>/uibuilder/<url>/src.
-->

<body>
    <div id="app" v-cloak>
<svg width="2560" height="1439.9999999999998" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">
 <!-- Created with Method Draw - http://github.com/duopixel/Method-Draw/ -->

 <g>
  <title>background</title>
  <rect x="-1" y="-1" width="2562" height="1442" id="canvas_background" fill="#001e46"/>
  <g id="canvasGrid" display="none">
   <rect id="svg_2" width="100%" height="100%" x="0" y="0" stroke-width="0" fill="url(#gridpattern)"/>
  </g>
 </g>
 <g>
  <title>Layer 1</title>
  <rect fill="#71c5e8" stroke-width="1.5" x="18" y="14.66667" width="2524" height="95" id="Header" stroke="#000"/>
  <rect fill="#00b050" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-opacity="null" x="22" y="148" width="667" height="574" id="OEE" stroke="#000"/>
  <rect fill="#00b050" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-opacity="null" x="811" y="148" width="500" height="574" id="Disponibilita" stroke="#000"/>
  <text fill="#ffffff" stroke-width="0" stroke-opacity="null" x="685" y="361" id="svg_6" font-size="24" font-family="'Trebuchet MS', Gadget, sans-serif" text-anchor="start" xml:space="preserve" transform="matrix(3.4649898935605408,0,0,3.368767116833098,-1643.8044110726364,-768.8742761372235) " stroke="#000">=</text>
  <text fill="#ffffff" stroke-width="0" stroke-opacity="null" x="860" y="361" id="svg_7" font-size="24" font-family="'Trebuchet MS', Gadget, sans-serif" text-anchor="start" xml:space="preserve" transform="matrix(3.4649898935605408,0,0,3.368767116833098,-1643.8044110726364,-768.8742761372235) " stroke="#000">x</text>
  <rect fill="#00b050" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-opacity="null" x="1405" y="148" width="500" height="574" id="Prestazione" stroke="#000"/>
  <text fill="#ffffff" stroke-width="0" stroke-opacity="null" x="1034" y="361" id="svg_11" font-size="24" font-family="'Trebuchet MS', Gadget, sans-serif" text-anchor="start" xml:space="preserve" transform="matrix(3.4649898935605408,0,0,3.368767116833098,-1643.8044110726364,-768.8742761372235) " stroke="#000">x</text>
  <rect fill="#00b050" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-opacity="null" x="2035" y="148" width="500" height="574.00002" id="Qualita" stroke="#000"/>
  <rect fill="#71c5e8" stroke-width="1.5" x="18" y="1297" width="2524" height="129.66665" id="footer" stroke="#000"/>
  <text fill="#001e46" stroke-width="0" x="143.34866" y="205.11241" id="svg_16" font-size="20" font-family="'Trebuchet MS', Gadget, sans-serif" text-anchor="start" xml:space="preserve" transform="matrix(5.352471554152697,0,0,3.340705158390369,-502.13985174337205,-450.84897919762534) " stroke="#001e46" font-weight="bold">OEE</text>
  <rect fill="#001e46" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-opacity="null" x="276.66667" y="249.93749" width="178.66667" height="5.33333" id="svg_18" stroke="#000"/>
  <text fill="#001e46" stroke-width="0" x="263.66691" y="197.13006" id="svg_19" font-size="10" font-family="'Trebuchet MS', Gadget, sans-serif" text-anchor="start" xml:space="preserve" transform="matrix(5.352471554152697,0,0,3.340705158390369,-502.13985174337205,-450.84897919762534) " stroke="#001e46" font-weight="bold" font-style="normal">Disponibilità</text>
  <text fill="#001e46" stroke-width="0" x="379.99946" y="196.59206" id="svg_20" font-size="10" font-family="'Trebuchet MS', Gadget, sans-serif" text-anchor="start" xml:space="preserve" transform="matrix(5.352471554152697,0,0,3.340705158390369,-502.13985174337205,-450.84897919762534) " stroke="#001e46" font-weight="bold" font-style="normal">Prestazione</text>
  <text fill="#001e46" stroke-width="0" x="500.3177" y="192.60088" id="svg_21" font-size="10" font-family="'Trebuchet MS', Gadget, sans-serif" text-anchor="start" xml:space="preserve" transform="matrix(5.352471554152697,0,0,3.340705158390369,-502.13985174337205,-450.84897919762534) " stroke="#001e46" font-weight="bold" font-style="normal">Qualità</text>
  <text fill="#001e46" stroke-width="0" x="170.75033" y="290.1244" id="svg_23" font-size="40" font-family="'Trebuchet MS', Gadget, sans-serif" text-anchor="start" xml:space="preserve" transform="matrix(5.352471554152697,0,0,3.340705158390369,-502.13985174337205,-450.84897919762534) " stroke="#001e46" font-weight="bold">%</text>
  <text fill="#001e46" stroke-width="0" x="309.00422" y="272.56323" id="svg_24" font-size="25" font-family="'Trebuchet MS', Gadget, sans-serif" text-anchor="start" xml:space="preserve" transform="matrix(5.352471554152697,0,0,3.340705158390369,-502.13985174337205,-450.84897919762534) " stroke="#001e46" font-weight="bold">%</text>
  <text fill="#001e46" stroke-width="0" x="425.83498" y="273" id="svg_25" font-size="25" font-family="'Trebuchet MS', Gadget, sans-serif" text-anchor="start" xml:space="preserve" transform="matrix(5.352471554152697,0,0,3.340705158390369,-502.13985174337205,-450.84897919762534) " stroke="#001e46" font-weight="bold">%</text>
  <text fill="#001e46" stroke-width="0" x="543.59989" y="272" id="svg_26" font-size="25" font-family="'Trebuchet MS', Gadget, sans-serif" text-anchor="start" xml:space="preserve" transform="matrix(5.352471554152697,0,0,3.340705158390369,-502.13985174337205,-450.84897919762534) " stroke="#001e46" font-weight="bold">%</text>
  <rect fill="#001e46" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-opacity="null" x="908.66669" y="215.27083" width="312" height="5.33333" id="svg_28" stroke="#000"/>
  <rect fill="#001e46" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-opacity="null" x="1542.00001" y="220.60416" width="281.33333" height="5.33333" id="svg_29" stroke="#000"/>
  <rect fill="#001e46" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-opacity="null" x="2177.99999" y="208.60416" width="181.33334" height="5.33333" id="svg_30" stroke="#000"/>
  <rect 
    style = {{colorStatus}}
    id="status" 
    height="113.33333" 
    width="500" 
    y="1306.33334" 
    x="2033" 
    />
  <!-- <rect fill= "#00b050" stroke-width="5" x="2033" y="1306.33334" width="500" height="113.33333" id="status" stroke= "#000"/> / -->
  <image x="2240.49998" y="24.99999" width="302.00004" height="80.00001" id="logo" xlink:href="data:image/png;base64,"/>
  <text font-weight="bold" xml:space="preserve" text-anchor="start" font-family="'Trebuchet MS', Gadget, sans-serif" font-size="40" id="svg_1" y="1384" x="2175" stroke-width="0" stroke="#000" fill="#eb1414"> {{colorStatus}} </text>
  <text font-weight="bold" xml:space="preserve" text-anchor="start" font-family="'Trebuchet MS', Gadget, sans-serif" font-size="40" id="svg_1" x="22" y="148"  stroke="#000" fill="#eb1414">{{Status}}</text>
  </g>
    </svg>  
    </div>

    <!-- These MUST be in the right order. Note no leading / -->
    <!-- REQUIRED: Socket.IO is loaded only once for all instances
                     Without this, you don't get a websocket connection -->
    <script src="../uibuilder/vendor/socket.io/socket.io.js"></script>

    
    <script src="../uibuilder/vendor/vue/dist/vue.js"></script> <!-- dev version with component compiler -->
    <!-- <script src="../uibuilder/vendor/vue/dist/vue.min.js"></script>   prod version with component compiler -->
    <!-- <script src="../uibuilder/vendor/vue/dist/vue.runtime.min.js"></script>   prod version without component compiler -->
    <script src="../uibuilder/vendor/bootstrap-vue/dist/bootstrap-vue.js"></script>

    <!-- REQUIRED: Sets up Socket listeners and the msg object -->
    <!-- <script src="./uibuilderfe.js"></script>   //dev version -->
    <script src="./uibuilderfe.min.js"></script> <!--    //prod version -->
    <!-- OPTIONAL: You probably want this. Put your custom code here -->
    <script src="./index.js"></script>

</body>

</html>
